items.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
items.summary: Core business is a transportation ticketing platform integrating QR tickets for transport, allowing travelers to search and book in one stop. Through real-time ticketing and secure payment, users get diverse tickets, exclusive discounts, and flexible cancellation policies for a better and safer trip.

items.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
items.summary: Core business is a high-performance digital advertising matching system (ADX) that pairs ads with the most suitable target audiences in real time. With smart bidding, advertisers gain high-value exposure cost-effectively, ensuring ads target relevant audiences. Publishers see higher fill rates and revenue with transparent reports.
